rows.label: tev057901_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057901_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Mujiji about the caravan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057901_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057901_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Mujiji about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057901_MSG0001
rows.name:
This area has come to depend on Dorian Caravan
of Mujiji.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057901_MSG0002
rows.name:
Food! Weapons! Materials! Whatever friends are
looking to order, caravan will find way to obtain
and deliver it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057901_MSG0003
rows.name:
No exceptions! Mujiji caters to every weirdo friend,
whether they are covered in crimson skin or thick
coat of fuzz.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057901_MSG0004
rows.name:
Mujiji will cater to human friends as well,
but friends have to show sign of goodwill.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057901_MSG0008
rows.name:
Does friend hail from spaceship that came crashing
down on western horizon?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057901_MSG0009
rows.name:
Hmph! Mujiji cannot allow caravan to do business
with shady customers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057901_MSG0010
rows.name:
If friend wants to shop here, bring Nopon emissary
here to speak on behalf of friend![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057901_MSG0011
rows.name: Nopon caravans take name of founder.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057901_MSG0012
rows.name:
Dorian was truly great leader. Took lots of guts to
venture into wasteland and start business here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057901_MSG0013
rows.name:
Dorian way braver than old Elder Nan, who only want
to hide like whiny baby in human city. Meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057901_MSG0014
rows.name:
Nan want Mumun and Mogugu and Mimiru to
become personal aides. Over dead body of Mujiji!
Lazy, spoiled elder just want servants...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057901_MSG0018
rows.name:
Ah! Human friend! Now that friendship treaty is in
place, just say word if anything is needed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057901_MSG0019
rows.name:
...Meh? Friend wants help taking out indigens?
Friend is looking for allies in war against Ganglion?
MmrrrRRRrrrrmmMMmmrrr...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057901_MSG0020
rows.name:
*ahem* Well naturally, Mujiji and Dorian Caravan
are strong enough to make short work of threats,
but also not want to steal thunder of friends.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057901_MSG0021
rows.name:
So, uh, instead caravan will look around here for
delicious food to deliver to friends!
No fighting on empty stomach, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057901_MSG0022
rows.name: Nopon caravans take name of caravan founder.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057901_MSG0023
rows.name:
Dorian was truly great leader. Took lots of guts to
venture into wasteland and start business here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057901_MSG0024
rows.name:
Mujiji want to be great leader too, so Mujiji has to
take good care of friends Mumun and Mogugu and
Mimiru.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057901_MSG0025
rows.name:
Mujiji would never pretend world revolved around self
and cause trouble like certain old spoiled Nopon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057901_MSG0029
rows.name:
Hello, friend! Many Nopon set off fireworks,
but none as wild and spectacular as those of Mujiji![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057901_MSG0030
rows.name:
Meh heh. Caravan of Mujiji take great pride in
ancient pyrotechnic firework wizardry handed down
from none other than great Dorian![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057901_MSG0031
rows.name:
Great and mighty Dorian used same fireworks to
frighten off monsters in this area before starting
caravan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057901_MSG0032
rows.name:
Such bravery! Such wit! Dorian was much better leader
than certain pervy elder.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057901_MSG0033
rows.name:
Mujiji going to work hard to become type of leader
caravan can follow with pride.[ST:wait ]
